Replies.Reply: ALRIGHT, GUESS.
No...It's something else... It's like the radioactivity is moving around us.
IT'S GOT TO BE OFF.
THAT'S THREE TIMES HIGHER THAN THE  FALLOUT IN CHERNOBYL...
YEAH. PROBABLY NEEDS SOME  ADJUSTMENT.
...CAN'T TRUST THE DIGITAL ONES...
What the hell is it?
Look what we found. Have you...
HELP ME... HELP ME, PLEASE HELP ME!
SOMEONE THERE?!
JUPITER! I GOT BUCKSHOT... YOU  HEAR?
They look human...
Ruby? Is that you?! Ruby?
RUBY! RU-BY!
RUBY?
IF THAT'S YOU JUPITER, I GOT A  BUCKSHOT FOR YA... YOU HEAR ME?!
California? Sure didn't take the fastest road!
Nothing to see in the desert.
You're at least six or seven hours away'from there.
You a cop?
You a cop too?
Huh...Make money in that?
Well you won't find any customers around here.
DON'T DRINK THAT WATER, MISS. IT  AIN'T NO GOOD.
She'll get sick.
36 dollars...
May I help you miss?
Isn't it illegal to have people in a trailer while you're driving, "my friend"?
Have a safe trip.
You know, it's not on the map, but if you take a right at the road a couple miles from here, it'll lead you through the hills. Probably save you three or four hours.
My wife... She didn't want to leave ...she wouldn't move to town even when the state police ordered us to. The kids grew up in the mines... Like animals...
What kind of place is that for children?
Jewels, a Swiss watch, a DV Cam, glasses, several cell phones, a pager, loose cash, credit cards, a wallet...
where the hell is everybody? I'm gonna...
Ah, there you are. Fill it up and check the fluids my friend.
You know, it's illegal to smoke around a gas station.
Give. the phone a rest, Bukowski!
Stop being at everyone's beck and call, Bukowski. You're the boss, remember?
Doesn't bother me. I had night patrol for almost fifteen years...
Detective...
I'm starting a private security firm...
What do -I owe you?
Keep your money Bukowski, I can still afford.the gas!
Let's go!
I'm fully aware of the driving laws.
Everyone ready?
Thanks for the tip.
Look how beautiful it is here girls... The hills, the colors...
She wasn't like that before... You should've seen her when she was your age.
Do you remember honey?
She remembers...
How am I supposed to drive with you talking my ear off? I'm pulling a trailer on a dirt road and it's 200 degrees out here!
The damn axel is broken...
With what? The frame is completely twisted... Give me your phone, I'm gonna call a tow truck...
That old thing? Give it a try, but this is mining country. Whatever metal is left in those hills will probably scramble the signal...
We're going to walk, that's what...
So we wait here for someone to drive by? Have you seen a car in the last three hours?!
I'd like to see how they stack up against this...
I'll take my bullets over your prayers any day.
Leave him alone son. Doug is a liberal, he wouldn't touch a gun...
It's always good to be prepared.
We've only got two and it's better if you guys have one here. You never know.
If you don't find any help in six or seven miles come back. I'll go to the gas station...
It's only about ten miles from here. I'll borrow that crazy old man's truck and use his phone if he has one... Don't worry... I'll be back with a tow truck before nightfall.
No. Stay here with your mother and sisters.
And you, don't tease your brother, he's in charge now.
HELLO! ANYONE HERE?!
It's Bob Carter, I got some gas from you a couple of hours ago.
Anybody there? Answer me!
Somebody home? Hello?
Dammit...
You son of a bitch...
IS THAT YOU MISTER?
I SAID PUT THAT WEAPON DOWN!
FREEZE!
Who's there?
Who's there? Show yourself!
My crazy husband absolutely had to see the desert.
.I'm sure all that important business can wait till next week.
How far are we from 1-88?
I told you we should have gone through Santa Fe. You never listen to me.
Not anymore. Thank God!
YOU HEAR THAT BRENDA? DON'T DRINK  THE WATER!
He's right, Bob.
I think we're somewhere on this blue road...
Don't drive so fast Bob, you might lose the camper...
Hey... Watch your mouth, young lady.
Will you please back me up here?
Oh, stop it...
Oh, so now it's my fault?
I bet this desert is full of rattlesnakes...
Some things never change...
It's almost 3, you'll never be back before sunset.
We should pray before you go-
Is it really too much to ask?
Bob?
You shouldn't go from the bottle to the breast. At her age she should get used to one or the other.
This place isn't so bad. At least the air is fresh.
Maybe it was my fault we had this accident...
This family has certainly seen its share of adventures.
Probably some rattlesnakes not far away.
Brenda's going off to college. And then, next year, it's Bobby's turn... The house is going to feel so empty...
I'm really happy that we're all together on this trip.
Bobby, come back!
BOB-BY?! BOB-BY!?
You think he can hear me?
She couldn't have gone that far.
BOB-BY?!
Hello...Hello... Can somebody hear me? Please answer if you hear me.
I heard something.
I'm not even sure I know how to use this thing.
It sounded like an animal...
Watch your language!
Lynn, wait.
You're lucky Brenda found you.
It doesn't work...
I'm sure it was just static.
Looks like we're camping out tonight. How's your head?
Bobby? What's going on?
Are you sure?
Me too, honey. Come inside. You've already spent enough time in the cold for one day, don't you think?
IT'S BOB! IT'S BOB!
No..No.. It's not possible. That's not Bob. That's not my Bob.
Doug.. It's not him. Tell me it's not him. It's not my Bob!
That is not my Bob! That is not my Bob! That's not him!
This camper's so small. No matter how much you clean, it's always a mess.
Is Big Bob home?
Did everyone go to bed?
Is Lynn sleeping?
Look in the closet Doug, I'm sure I have another blanket. I'm so cold.
You've always been so sweet. I understand why Lynn loves you so much.
Piece of shit! Why couldn't we fly like normal people?
Please, your parents can't stand me.
We could have taken them on a cruise.
What's that supposed to mean?
Maybe I shouldn't have even come.
It won't be in a shitty trailer home-that's for sure.
Excuse me sir, do you have a phone I can use? I can't get a signal around here and...
Sorry Bob, "duty calls"...
This is why I don't go on vacation.
Who me? No way. I'm in telecommunications.
Everybody's gotta have a cell phone...
No kidding...
Let me pay, Bob.
That's not what I meant...
Honey!? We're leaving...
Honey? What are you doing?!
I tried for an hour but I couldn't get it cold in here.
How do you know all this stuff?
Well, at least we can breathe now.
Fuck her!
Fuck him too. You want one?
Yeah right, if you start smoking your sister would cut my nuts off.
Hey, I like seeing your parents...
.in pictures!
What the hell happened?! Where's Catherine?
I knew this wasn't gonna be safe for the baby.
Are you all right?
He searches desperately for a signal, extending his arm forward. Lynn grabs him tenderly by the waist.
Your father wanted to see the desert...
I hope he's enjoying himself.
So what's the damage, General?
Can we fix it?
I already tried. I'm not getting a signal.
What are we going to do?
Oh no! No thanks buddy...
Lynn, can you bring me my jacket honey?
I'll keep walking north. This road's gotta lead somewhere.
"...All the leaves are brown and the sky is gray. I've been for a walk on a winter's day. I'd be safe and warm if I was in L.A... California dreamin..."
I was in LA._ California Dreamin..."
What the hell?!
What the fuck are you doing? Don't point that thing at me.
Who else would it be?!
Hey girls!
Look what I found.
With all of this, we can find a way to fix the car, right Bobby?
I found this really huge crater at the end of the road! I've never seen anything like it! People must use it as a dump site. It was full of all this garbage...
Look at this, it's brand new!
No. The road just stops there. I hope your dad has better luck.
I'm tired, I really need to rest for an hour or so...
You want us to sleep on the floor?!
What?
So, what Bobby?
Listen... I'm sure your dad will be back soon. He's "Big Bob". It's gonna take more than a few snakes in the dark to stop him, right?
Are you coming, honey?
If he's not back by midnight, we'll go get him. Deal?
Ow, Ow... Yeah right there.
Stop! Stop, you're tickling me!
Oh, so you want to play?
I love you too...
Damanit! What is it now?
Beauty what?
Calm down Bobby, OK? Let's go check it out together. Lynn, stay right here.
Brenda, stay with Catherine!
Take your mother away from here!
Where are you going? Bobby?
Come back here, Bobby!
No...No...
Not yet.
Yes, Brenda is here and Bobby is in the kitchen.
Yes..
Do you need anything?
There's one here. Nice and warm.
DON'T BE STUPID! WE'RE NOT GOING  ANYWHERE, DO YOU HEAR ME?
You want to die, too?
Look! Look at what they did to your mother. Look at what they did to your sister.
You're not a fucking child, alright? Think before you do something stupid. You won't make it three feet! We need a plan, OK? We need to think...
STOP IT! SHUT UP! JUST SHUT YOUR  FUCKING MOUTH!
Get ready Bobby..
Beast!
WHAT THE FUCK DO YOU WANT? WHY ARE  YOU DOING THIS TO US?!
ANSWER ME! WHY US?!
Give me back my little girl... Give her back to me...
DO YOU HEAR ME?!
How much ammo do you have left?
No, you stay here with your sister and stay by the radio. Somebody's bound to hear us.
The sun'll be up soon. One of them is hurt, I'm going to follow his trail through the hills.
No. You keep it in case they come back.
Don't worry about me, I'll take Beast.
Yes?
I'm going to find.our baby my love...I promise.
I told you to stop smoking.
Bobby? Bobby? You read me?
I followed the blood, I'm in front of a mine!
I'm not sure if I'll get a signal from inside. If you don't hear from me in a half an hour, you're on your own.
Bobby?
You ready big guy? I hope you're not afraid of the dark.
Come on. You can't be serious.
Just stay calm, boy...
.Bobby, Bobby, it's Doug... I can't believe it! I found a street and some houses. Maybe somebody does live here...
Bobby, do you hear me? Bobby?
Find her, Beast, find Catherine...
You wait here Beast! Come on, sit!... Good boy. I'm gonna find Catherine...
Shhhh... Quiet Beast... Don't move!
Where's my baby! Where's Catherine?!
What did you do with her?
Where is she then? ANSWER ME!
What signs?!
What the hell are you saying?!
I don't know what you're talking about. All I want is my daughter.
What do you want? Money? I can give you money... WHAT DO YOU WANT?
Where are the others? Where is my baby?
What? What's so funny?
Please, I'm begging you... Don't kill me...
Catherine?!
CATHERINE!
Catherine!
My baby ...My little princess... It's me, it's daddy...
Relax Doug, please. It's their silver anniversary and they're so happy you're here.
You're wrong. They love you.
Yeah, that's a great idea. Why didn't you plan it?
Never mind.
Doug, please stop. I never ask you for anything, OK?
Well see how happy you are when Catherine comes along on our 25th anniversary.
I heard that...
If you want to use the restroom, it's now or never.
Honey, you haven't put that phone down since we left.
Are you wearing sunblock? The sun's so strong.
Beauty? Come on, sweetie...
Beauty?
Come on, Beauty. There's nothing here...
Sorry, our dog got out...She won't stay put...
I'M COMING!
Mom, we're not on the blue road or any other road. He said it wasn't on the map, remember?
Relax, Mom. We're all just tired.
Doug? Bobby? Are you alright?
She's fine. Mom has her.
The heat must have caused a blow out.
I think so... Just a little shaken up.
Doug...
Catherine just fell asleep. How are you holding up?
Yeah, this is a total drag, especially with a baby.
We're not going to have many more trips like this together... As for Cancun, you're gonna have to find a job.
What are you going to do with those?
Are you taking a gun too?
Are you sure you're going to be alright?
Hey, little princess. Who doesn't want to sleep anymore?
Are you hungry, my angel?
Mom, thanks for the advice, but she's my baby.
It's starting to get cold out here, isn't it?
I can't believe you're spending your anniversary stranded in the middle of nowhere.
Better than Cleveland...
Please, Mom. Nothing can stop Dad when he thinks he's found a shortcut. Remember when we ran out of gas on the "shortcut" to the Great Lakes? How old was I? 12, 13?
Yeah-what I'd do for a shower and a margarita...
A real bed...
Why are the dogs so excited?
I don't know, Mom.
Keep it together Brenda, Mom is already worried enough... The fire will help Bobby find his way back.
He and Beauty will find their way back together.
I never thought it could be so cold in the desert...
I know...
How's it going?
Mayday ...mayday... This is a distress call... Do you copy?
Mayday. . .We're stranded in the desert, we need help...mayday...
What was that?
If animals start answering our radio calls, we're really fucked!
Give it a rest, Mom. We have more important things to worry about.
Brenda?
BRENDA?!
Brenda? Brenda?
We heard something. Some sort of breathing...
It was really weird, right mom?
Mom, it sounded like a perverted crank call.
What are you going to do with a fishing pole in the desert? You didn't you find anybody?
Let's go, it's freezing out here.
Don't close the door, we're leaving in a second!
I'm almost ready...
A little work out can't be all that bad for these guys, right?
I love you...
What do you want, Bobby?
This had better be important.
Bobby... We're in the middle of nowhere. Believe me, no one could survive out here!
What are you talking about?
Oh my god!
No...No...Please... Please don't...
Wake up, lard ass.
You two make a perfect pair.
Why not?
God, what do you care?
What the hell Brenda!
Freak.
There!
It was nothing... The thermostat was disconnected.
I don't know.
I thought you stopped smoking?
Does my sister know?
Big Bob would kill you if he knew you were smoking in his "88 Airstream"...
It's cool that you came with us.
Don't worry, we're fine.
Holy shit!
I hope they have triple A out here...
I saw a documentary on The Discovery channel about desert snakes. If you get bit, you'll die in twenty minutes.
.or was it five?
You think we'll see scorpions and coyotes?
Hey Doug, wanna try?
Come on, just one shot, it makes you feel kinda powerful.
Can I go with Doug?
Has anybody seen my grey sweatshirt? It was in the car. I've looked everywhere.
You know how Freud would've interpreted your obsession with rattlesnakes Mom?
Brenda, the dogs!
Worried, Ethel watches her son distance himself from the camper.
BEAUTY!
Beauty? Beauty?
Beauty?
Don't... Don't be scared. I won't hurt you... What are you doing here?
So you're the one who took my sweatshirt? Where did you find it?
What's your name?
What are you doing here Ruby? Where are your parents? My family needs help. We had an accident.
I heard you, Ruby... Are you here alone?
Ruby... I'm looking for my dog...
That's right, have you seen her?
Have you seen her?
Look at me, Ruby... Look at me...
What? I can't understand. What are you saying?
Ruby, come back!
Have you tried the radio?
What do you mean?
Ssshhhh...
I want you guys to stay in here.
I didn't know it was you.
Nothing, Mom.
I'll feel a lot better when dad gets back.
Where are you going? You don't want to wait until Dad comes back?
We can squeeze in here. You'll be more comfortable.
I need to talk to you...
What?
Whatever...
Beast?!
Beast? Come on, boy. You hear me!
Beast? Beast? Its me. Come on...
Doug! Doug!
Come on, open up!
Something's going on around here.
I know this sounds weird, but there are people living in those hills.
I saw them. And Beauty...
They cut out her insides.
Her guts were all over the place...
I...I didn't want to scare you so I didn't say anything, but something's going on... You even said you heard some breathing on the radio didn't you?
We're not alone, I'm telling you...
I'm gonna take care of the motherfuckers!
Come on Doug! They're in the trailer-!
What are we going to do Doug? What are we going to do if they come back?
Doug!
Come on! I'm not going to take this shit...
Fine. You stay here. I'm going after them.
Let me go!
I don't care.
Think about what? They have Catherine, Doug...
THEY HAVE CATHERINE... You know what they could to do to her, and you're not going to stop them?! You're just a coward...
Good boy.. That's a good dog.
I don't know, half a clip?
Let me go with you.
What about you?
Doug?
I... I didn't mean what I said...
Yeah, Doug...
Yeah... Good luck, Doug.
Nobody's going to find us Brenda, even with that smoke...Nobody's coming._.. You heard what Doug said-We're alone now, just you and me. Let them come, I'm waiting for them.
Stay close Brenda.
He's over there. Get the trailer ready.._ The new "visitor" has brought the nightmare back to life in Brenda's eyes. She's paralyzed.
Brenda? Come on?
BRENDA?!
Bobby, come look at this.
Oh my god! Poor thing.
Don't pee there...
Hello?
Piggy, piggy, piggy...
What?
Dad, you shouldn't have listened to that guy. We're lost.
Neither do we, Dad.
.this is fucked...
You grew up in the 60's. How can you be so uptight?!
Thrilled to be here!
I don't care what they say, next year, I'm going to Cancun with my friends. No more "family trips" for me...
C'mon, with all the money your husband makes, you could at least buy me a plane ticket.
Don't you think? Please, for your poor little sister...
"Right away, honey..."
Yeah, right.
Oh please!
Thank God nobody's watching us.
I can already see the headlines: "Family found dead in New Mexico desert."
I think it stinks.
Anything's better than Cleveland!
If we had just stayed on the main road we'd already be in California...
The beach...
I didn't touch your smelly sweatshirt.
That makes one of us.
BOBBY! BOB-BY!
We should've gone looking for him when it was still light out. I'm nervous.
What if he doesn't come back? Maybe he's hurt. Maybe there was an accident...
Bobby was only wearing a t-shirt when he left.
BOBBY? BOBBY?
BOBBY? BOB-BY?
I'm here! I'll be back in a minute.
BOBBY? BOB-BY?
Don't worry, Beauty will come back when she's hungry...
Only Mom would get an obscene phone call out here!
What's wrong with you?
Doug's back!
Can I listen to your iPod?
Can I borrow your iPod?
No.. No... don't turn it off!
He swore he'd come back to get me.
THEY'RE HERE... THEY'RE BACK... I  DON'T WANT TO DIE BOBBY...I DON'T  WANT TO DIE...DO SOMETHING...
Mayday... Mayday... We need help ..Mayday... Mayday... can anybody hear me?
Mayday...mayday... Can anybody hear me?
Maybe somebody heard our calls..
I don't.see anybody... What's happening?
answer me, why isn't anyone there?
Look!
Let's go back...
What happened? What happened Bobby?
Come on, Bobby. Let's get out of here...
.Annnnaaaaau...
You want to play with us mister?
Just got on the road... A Chevy and a trailer...
Papa Jupe... Papa Jupe... Coast is clear.
What's the matter Ruby.. .You don't like dog anymore?
A THIN SHADOW ON THE GROUND. Someone or something is hiding behind a rock.
A YOUNG GIRL, ABOUT 14, WEARING HIS STOLEN SWEATSHIRT. She is about five feet tall and frail.
Ru... Ruby... Ruby...
Ru... Ruby... Ruby...
Beauty...
Ruby.. _Ruby is Beauty...
The hills... The hills have eyes...The hills have eyes...The hills have eyes...

..Daddy...

Noaowww!
Loook at-t hiiis fa-ace... Loook at-
Move!

I told ya to move!
Big fat baby good.., you fat... Fat and juicy!
Baby... Baby...
Take it.
Come on bitch...
I'll come back for ya...
Get out of the way Ruby...
I TOLD YOU TO MOVE. NOW MOVE!
RUUUBY!
Ruby...Ruby! You come back here right now. You hear me, you little bitch?
Give me that baby, Ruby!
CLICK! - no more bullets.
"Goggle? Goggle..."
"Goggle, you copy? Goggle..."
"Goggle? Goggle?"
"Papa Jupe... Goggle is dead. I found him in the rocks..."
Put that down Ruby... You know better than to play with your food...
Listen to your mother Ruby and put that baby down... Now!
Nothing but the wind blowing through the houses.
..Nothing..
.I don't know where she is. I never leave this place...
..You should've read the signs before taking that road...
You people settled on our lands, you destroyed our homes, destroyed our silver mines. . .You 'ye made us what we've become!
Maybe a trailer? Yeah, a pretty trailer, just like yours.

The baby... the baby is in the last house on the left...
Lizard... Kill the baby...

DOUG IS HOLDING THE AXE.
